Verses: 1 karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal; Idho, Naan Baabilonukku Virodhamaagavum, Enakku Virodhamaai Ezhumbugiravargalin Maththiyil Kudiyirukkiravargalukku Virodhamaagavum Azhikkum Kaatrai Ezhumbappanni,
2 thootruvaarai Baabilonukku Anuppuven; Avargal Adhaiththootri, Verumaiyaakkippoduvaargal; Aabaththunaalile Adharku Virodhamaai Soozhndhukondiruppaargal.

3 villai Naanetrugiravanukku Virodhamaagavum, Than Kavasaththil Perumaipaaraattugiravanukku Virodhamaagavum, Vilveeran Than Villai Naanetrakkadavan; Adhin Vaalibaraith Thappavidaamal Adhin Senaiyai Ellaam Sangaarampannungal.
4 kuththippodappattavargal Kaldheyarin Dhesaththilum, Kolaiseyyappattavargal Adhin Veedhigalilum Vizhuvaargal.
5 avargal Dhesam Isravelin Parisuththarukku Virodhamaaga Seydha Akkiramaththinaal Niraindhirundhum, Yoodhaa Than Dhevanaalum Isravel Senaigalinkarththaraalum Kaividappadavillai.

6 neengal Baabilonin Akkiramaththil Sangaaramaagaadhapadikku Adhin Naduvilirundhu Odi, Avaravar Thangal Aaththumaavaith Thappuviyungal; Idhu Karththar Adhinidaththil Pazhivaangugira Kaalamaayirukkiradhu; Avar Adharkup Padhil Seluththuvaar.
7 baabilon Karththarudaiya Kaiyilulla Porpaaththiram; Adhu Boomi Anaiththaiyum Verikkappanninadhu; Adhin Madhuvai Jaadhigal Kudiththaargal; Aagaiyaal Jaadhigal Buththimayangipponaargal.
8 baabilon Sadidhiyil Vizhundhu Thagarndhadhu; Adharkaaga Alarungal; Adhin Noyai Aatrap Pisin Thailam Podungal; Oruvelai Gunamaagum.

9 baabilonaik Gunamaakkumpadip Paarththom, Adhu Gunamaagavillai; Adhai Vittuvidungal; Naam Avaravar Nammudaiya Dhesangalukkup Pogakkadavom; Adhin Aakkinai Vaanamattum Eri Aagaayamandalangal Pariyandham Ettinadhu.
10 karththar Nammudaiya Needhiyai Velippaduththinaar; Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Seyalai Seeyonil Vivarippom Vaarungal.

11 ambugalaith Thulakkungal; Kedagangalai Nandraai Seppanidungal; Karththar Medhiyarudaiya Raajaakkalin Aaviyai Ezhuppinaar; Baabilonai Azhikkavendumenbadhe Avarudaiya Ninaivu; Idhu Karththar Vaangum Pazhi, Idhu Thamadhu Aalayaththukkaaga Avar Vaangum Pazhi.

12 baabilonin Madhilgalmel Kodiyetrungal, Kaavalai Balappaduththungal, Jaaman Kaakkiravargalai Niruththungal, Padhiviruppaarai Vaiyungal; Aanaalumkarththar Eppadi Ninaiththaaro Appadiye Thaam Baabilonin Kudigalukku Virodhamaaga Sonnadhai Seyvaar.
13 thiralaana Thanneergalinmel Vaasampannugiravale, Thiranda Sambaththudaiyavale, Unakku Mudivum Un Porulaasaikku Ozhivum Vandhadhu.
14 meyyaagave, Pachchaikkiligalaip Pol Thiralaana Manusharaal Unnai Nirambappannuven; Avargal Unmel Aaravaaram Pannuvaargal Endru Senaigalin Karththar Thammudaiya Jeevanaikkondu Aanaiyittaar.
15 avar Boomiyaith Thamadhu Vallamaiyinaal Undaakki, Poochchakkaraththaith Thamadhu Gnaanaththinaal Padaiththu, Vaanaththaith Thamadhu Perarivinaal Viriththaar.

16 avar Saththamidugaiyil Thiralaana Thanneer Vaanaththil Undaagiradhu; Avar Boomiyin Ellaigalilirundhu Megangalai Ezhumbappanni, Mazhaiyudane Minnalgalai Undaakki, Kaatraith Thamadhu Pandasaalaiyilirundhu Evividugiraar.
17 manushar Anaivarum Arivillaamal Miruga Gunamaanaargal; Thattaar Anaivarum Suroobangalaale Vetkip Pogiraargal; Avargal Vaarppiththa Vikkiragam Poiye, Avaigalil Suvaasam Illai.
18 avaigal Maayaiyum Magaa Eththumaana Kiriyaiyaayirukkiradhu; Avaigal Visaarikkappadum Naalile Azhiyum.
19 yaakkobin Pangaayirukkiravar Avaigalaippola Alla, Avar Sarvaththaiyum Undaakkinavar; Isravel Avarudaiya Sudhandharamaana Koththiram; Senaigalin Karththar Enbadhu Avarudaiya Naamam.
20 nee Enakku Thandaayudhamum Asthiraayudhamumaanavan; Naan Unnaikkondu Jaadhigalai Norukkuven; Unnaikkondu Raajyangalai Azhippen.
21 unnaikkondu Kudhiraiyaiyum, Kudhirai Veeranaiyum Norukkuven; Unnaikkondu Radhaththaiyum Radhaveeranaiyum Norukkuven.
22 unnaikkondu Purushanaiyum Sthreeyaiyum Norukkuven; Unnaikkondu Kizhavanaiyum Ilaignanaiyum Norukkuven; Unnaikkondu Vaalibanaiyum Kannigaiyaiyum Norukkuven.
23 unnaikkondu Meyppanaiyum Avanudaiya Mandhaiyaiyum Norukkuven; Unnaikkondu Uzhavanaiyum Avanudaiya Uzhavukaalaigalaiyum Norukkuven; Unnaikkondu Adhipadhigalaiyum Adhigaarigalaiyum Norukkuven.
24 baabilonukkum Kaldheyar Dhesaththin Sagala Kudigalukkum, Avargal Ungal Kangalukku Munbaaga Seeyonil Seydha Avargaludaiya Ellaap Pollaappukkaagavum Pazhivaanguven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

25 idho, Boomiyai Ellaam Kedukkira Kedaana Parvadhame, Naan Unakku Virodhamaaga Vandhu, En Kaiyai Unakku Virodhamaaga Neetti, Unnaik Kanmalaigalilirundhu Urutti, Unnai Erindhupona, Parvadhamaakkippoduven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
26 moolaikkallukkaagilum Asthibaarakkallukkaagilum Oru Kallaiyum Unnilirundhu Edukkamaattaargal; Nee Endrendraikkum Paazhaaikkidakkira Sthalamaavaai Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

27 dhesaththile Kodiyetrungal; Jaadhigalukkul Ekkaalam Oodhungal; Jaadhigalai Adharku Virodhamaaga Aayaththappaduththungal; Aararaadh, Minni, Askenaas Ennum Raajyangalai Adharku Virodhamaagath Thalakarththanukkup Pattankattungal; Sunaiyulla Vettukkiligalpondra Kudhiraigalai Varappannungal.

28 medhiyaadhesaththin Raajaakkalum Adhin Thalaivarum Adhin Sagala Adhigaarigalum Avaravarudaiya Raajyabaaraththukkuk Keezhaana Sagala Dhesaththaarumaagiya Jaadhigalai Adharku Virodhamaaga Aayaththappaduththungal.
29 appozhudhu Dhesam Adhirndhu Vedhanaippadum; Baabilon Dhesaththaik Kudiyillaadhapadip Paazhaakka, Baabilonukku Virodhamaaik Karththar Ninaiththavaigal Nilaikkum.

30 baabilonin Paraakkiramasaaligal Yuththampannaamal, Kottaigalil Irundhuvittaargal; Avargal Paraakkiramam Azhindhu Pedigalaanaargal; Adhin Vaasasthalangalaik Koluththippottaargal; Adhin Thaazhppaalgal Udaikkappattadhu.

31 kadaiyaandhira Munaithuvakki Avanudaiya Pattanam Pidipattadhu Endrum; Thuraivazhigal Adappattuppoi, Naanalgal Akkiniyaal Sutterikkappattadhu Endrum, Yuththa Manushar Kalangiyirukkiraargal Endrum Baabilon Raajaavukku Arivikka,
32 anjarkaaranmel Anjarkaaranum Thoodhanmel Thoodhanum Odugiraan.

33 baabilon Kumaaraththi Midhikkappadun Kalaththukku Samaanam; Adhaipporadikkun Kaalam Vandhadhu; Innum Konjakkaalaththile Aruppukkaalam Adharku Varum Endru Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.

34 baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Ennaip Patchiththaan, Ennaik Kalangadiththaan, Ennai Verum Paaththiramaaga Vaiththupponaan; Valusarppampola Ennai Vizhungi, En Suvaiyulla Padhaarththangalaal Than Vayitrai Nirappinaan, Ennaith Thuraththivittaan.

35 enakkum En Inaththaarukkum Seydha Kodumaiyin Pazhi Baabilon Mel Varakkadavadhendru Seeyonil Vaasamaanaval Sollugiraal; En Raththappazhi Kaldheyar Dhesaththuk Kudigalinmel Varakkadavadhendru Erusalem Enbavalum Sollugiraal.
36 aagaiyaal Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal; Idho, Naan Unakkaaga Vazhakkaadi, Un Pazhikkup Pazhivaangi, Adhin Kadalai Varalavum Adhin Ootrai Suvaravumpannuven.
37 appozhudhu Baabilon Kudiyillaadha Manmedugalum, Valusarppangalin Thaabaramum, Paazhum, Eesalpodappadudhalukku Idamumaaippogum.
38 egamaai Avargal Singangalaip Polak Kerchchiththu, Singangkkuttigalaip Pola Saththamiduvaargal.

39 avargal Kalikkum Samayaththile Naan Avargal Kudikkum Paanaththai Avargalukkuk Kudikkakkoduththu, Avargal Thullaththakkadhaaga Avargalai Veriyaakkuven; Adhinaal Avargal Endrendraikkum Vizhikkaadha Niththirai Adaivaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
40 avargalai Aattukkuttigalaip Polavum, Aattukkadaakkalaippolavum, Vellaattukkadaakkalaippolavum Adikkappada Irangippogap Pannuven.
41 sesaakku Pidiyundu, Boomimuzhudhum Pugazhum Pugazhchchi Adappattadhu Eppadi? Jaadhigalukkulle Baabilon Brammippaanadhu Eppadi?
42 samuththiram Baabilonmel Puranduvandhadhu; Adhin Alaigalin Thiratchiyinaal Adhu Moodappattadhu.
43 adhin Pattanangal Paazhumaai, Varatchiyum Vanaandharamumaana Boomiyumaai, Oru Manushanum Kudiyiraadhadhum Oru Manupuththiranum Kadavaadhadhumaana Nilamumaaippoyitru.
44 naan Baabilonil Irukkira Pelai Dhandippen; Adhu Vizhunginadhai Adhin Vaayilirundhu Kakkappannuven; Jaadhigal Ini Adhinidaththirku Odivaramaattaargal, Baabilonin Madhilum Vizhum.
45 en Janangale, Neengal Adhin Naduvilirundhu Purappadungal; Karththarudaiya Kobaththin Ukkiraththukkuth Thappumpadi Avanavan Thanthan Aaththumaavai Ratchiththukkollakkadavan.

46 ungal Irudhayam Thuvalaamalum, Dhesaththil Ketkappadum Seydhiyinaal Neengal Bayappadaamalum Irungal; Oru Varushaththile Oru Seydhi Ketkappattu, Pinbu Maruvarushaththile Veru Seydhi Ketkappadum; Dhesaththile Kodumai Undaagum; Aalugiravanmel Aalugiravan Varuvaan.
47 aagaiyaal, Idho, Naan Baabilonin Vikkiragangalai Dhandikkum Naatkal Varum, Appozhudhu Adhin Dhesam Ellaam Kalangum; Adhil Kolaiyungira Yaavarum Adhin Naduvil Vizhundhukidappaargal.
48 vaanamum Boomiyum Avaigalilulla Yaavum Baabilonmel Gembeerikkum; Paazhkkadikkiravargal Adharku Vadakkeyirundhu Varuvaargal Endru Karththarsollugiraar;
49 baabilon Isravelil Kolaiyundavargalai Vizhappanninadhupola, Baabilonilum Samastha Dhesangalilum Kolaiyungiravargal Vizhuvaargal.
50 pattayaththukkuth Thappinavargale, Thangiththariyaamal Nadandhuvaarungal; Dhooraththile Karththarai Ninaiyungal; Erusalem Ungal Gnaabagaththil Varakkadavadhu.
51 nindhaiyaik Kettadhinaal Vetkappattom; Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Parisuththa Sthalangalinmel Anniyar Vandhadhinaal Naanam Nammudaiya Mugangalai Mooditru.
52 aagaiyaal, Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal; Idho, Naan Adhin Vikkiragangalukku Virodhamaai Visaarikkum Naatkal Varum; Appozhudhu Adhin Dhesamengum Kolaiyungiravargal Kaththuvaargal.
53 baabilon Vaanapariyandham Erinaalum, Adhu Than Balamaana Aranai Uyarththinaalum, Adhaip Paazhaakkugiravargal Ennidaththilirundhu Varuvaargal Endru Karththarsollugiraar.
54 baabilonilirundhu Kookkuralin Saththamum, Kaldheyar Dhesaththilirundhu Magaa Sangaaramum Ketkappadum.
55 karththar Baabilonaip Paazhaakki Adhilulla Periya Saththaththai Ozhiyappannuvaar; Avargaludaiya Alaigal Thiralaana Thanneergalaippola Iraiyum, Avargaludaiya Saththam Amaliyaayirukkum.

56 baabilonaip Paazhaakkugiravan Adhinmel Varugiraan; Adhin Paraakkiramasaaligal Pidipaduvaargal; Avargaludaiya Villugal Murindhupogum; Sarikattugira Dhevanaagiya Karththar Nichchayamaagap Padhil Alippaar.

57 adhin Prabukkalaiyum Adhin Gnaanigalaiyum Adhin Thalaivaraiyum Adhin Adhigaarigalaiyum Adhin Paraakkiramasaaligalaiyum Verikkappannuven; Appozhudhu Avargal Endrendraikkum Vizhikkaadha Thookkamaaith Thoongi Vizhuvaargal Endru Senaigalin Karththar Ennum Naamamulla Raajaa Sollugiraar.

58 baabilonin Vistheeranamaana Madhilgal Mutrilum Tharaiyaakkappattu, Adhin Uyaramaana Vaasalgal Akkiniyaal Sutterikkappadum; Appadiye Janangal Prayaasappattadhu Virudhaavaagavum, Jaadhigal Varuththappattu Sambaadhiththadhu Akkinikku Iraiyumaagumendru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.
59 baabilonmel Varum Ellaath Theengaiyum, Baabilonukku Virodhamaaga Ezhudhappatta Indha Ellaa Vasanangalaiyum Eremiyaa Oru Pusthagaththil Ezhudhinaan.

60 yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Sidhekkiyaa Raajyabaarampannum Naalaam Varushaththile Baabilonukkup Pona Samayaththil Avanode Koodappona Maseyaavin Maganaagiya Neriyaavin Kumaaranum Saandhagunamulla Prabuvumaagiya Seraayaavukku Eremiyaa Theerkkadharisi Karpiththa Vaarththai.
61 eremiyaa Seraayaavai Nokki: Nee Baabilonukku Vandhapinbu Nee Idhaip Paarththu, Indha Ellaa Vasanangalaiyum Vaasiththu Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal:

62 karththaave, Indha Sthalaththile Manushanum Mirugamudhalaaith Thangiththarikkaadhapadikkum, Adhu Endrendraikkum Paazhaaik Kidakkumpadikkum, Adhai Azhiththuppoduven Endru Dhevareer Adhaikkuriththu Uraiththeer Enbadhai Nee Solli
63 nee Indhap Pusthagaththai Vaasiththuth Theerndhapodhu, Adhile Oru Kallaikkatti, Adhai Aippiraaththu Naduvile Erindhuvittu,

64 ippadiye Baabilon Muzhugip Pogum, Naan Adhinmel Varappannum Theenginaal Ezhundhirukkamaattaamal Ilaiththu Vizhuvaargal Endraar Endru Solluvaayaaga Endraan. Eremiyaavin Vasanangal Ivvalavode Mudindhadhu.
